headline: Microchip Technology Unveils Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server to Power AI-Driven Product Data Access
summary: Server enables access to trusted product information across AI platforms to simplify workflows, accelerate design and boost productivityCHANDLER, Ariz., Nov. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Further demonstrating its commitment to developing AI-enabled solutions for embedded engineers, Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) has announced the launch of its Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server. An AI interface, the MCP Server connects directly with compatible AI tools and large language models (LLMs) to p
